local_intent: Align tool yaw to 270 deg, approach the T-block, execute a 0.1 m push toward 270 deg with safety timeouts, then retreat and wait; use detect/scan fallback and visibility check before motion.
assumptions: Block is within reachable workspace and visible after detection
No obstacles along the push path
coherence_with_global: Matches global sequence: detect→scan fallback, confirm visibility, set yaw=270, retry approach if needed, push distance=0.1 at 270°, retreat, then wait; all timeouts from allowed bins.
